Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers

Class GoalManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.managers.GoalManager
public class GoalManager extends Object
Class used to load the goals, handle all the managers and calculate total points

    • frequentUpdates

      private Boolean frequentUpdates
      if set to false only pointsManagers with updateRule set to END_TURN will be updated every turn if set to true only pointsManagers with updateRule set to END_GAME will NOT be updated every turn

  • Constructor Details

    • GoalManager

      public GoalManager(List<Player> players, String setUpFile, boolean isFirstGame, boolean fromInternResources) throws ArrestGameException
      Reads settings from json file and initializes the managers accordingly
      Parameters:
      players - players playing the game
      setUpFile - file json where there are the patterns associated with card type
      isFirstGame - true if is the first game of the players (game rule)
      fromInternResources - true if setUpFile used is from internal resources
      Throws:
      ArrestGameException - if occurred very bad errors in parsing or json stream

    • GoalManager

      public GoalManager(CommonCardsPointsManager commonCardsPointsManager, PersonalCardsPointsManager personalCardsPointsManager, CommonGoalsPointsManager commonGoalsPointsManager, Boolean frequentUpdates, int CommonCardsToDraw)
      Constructor of GoalManager when game is loaded
      Parameters:
      commonCardsPointsManager - commonCardsPointsManager
      personalCardsPointsManager - personalCardsPointsManager
      commonGoalsPointsManager - commonGoalsPointsManager
      frequentUpdates - frequentUpdates
      CommonCardsToDraw - CommonCardsToDraw

  • Method Details

    • readCards

      private List<Pattern> readCards(@NotNull @NotNull com.google.gson.stream.JsonReader reader, String cardsType) throws com.google.gson.JsonIOException, com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException
      Read a card from
      Parameters:
      reader - reader from witch read the json
      cardsType - type of cards in the file json
      Returns:
      list of patterns of selected cardsType
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonIOException - from JsonParser
      com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - from JsonParser

    • readPattern

      private Pattern readPattern(com.google.gson.JsonElement cardJson) throws RuntimeException
      Read a pattern
      Parameters:
      cardJson - JsonElement representing the card
      Returns:
      pattern to be generated from parsing. Returns null if pattern is invalid
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if there is bad formatting in the file, but we must throw so the GoalManager can try to read the other patterns

    • getSetupFileReader

      private Reader getSetupFileReader(String path, boolean intern) throws FileNotFoundException, URISyntaxException
      gets the file reader given a file
      Parameters:
      path - file path
      intern - true if the file is from internal resources
      Returns:
      the file reader
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found
      URISyntaxException - if there were problems with the uri interface

    • updatePointsTurn

      public void updatePointsTurn(Player player)
      Update the points at the end of a turn
      Parameters:
      player - the player updates the points of the player relative to every pointsManager that should be updated every turn if frequent is set to true, unless the pm specifies end game updates, it will be updated if frequent is set to false, unless the pm specifies end turn updates, it will NOT be updated

    • updatePointsEnd

      public void updatePointsEnd(Player player)

      Parameters:
